quizlist.question: Who is the authorize to cancel load line certificate of vessel?
When oily ballast has been pumped overboard, an entry must be made in the __________.?
One of the many objectives of this code is to ensure the early and efficient collection and exchange of security- related information. What is this code?
quizlist.option3: Code of Safe Practice for the Handling of Cargo

quizlist.question: Sanitary, ballast, bilge or general service pumps may be accepted as fire pumps provided: (SOLAS II-2/4.3.2)?
quizlist.option1: They are not normally used for pumping oil
quizlist.option2: They can be started from a position outside the engine room
quizlist.option3: They are fitted with automatic start connected to the fire alarm

quizlist.question: Coast Guard Regulations (46 CFR) require that electric and electro-hydraulic steering gear motors shall be?
quizlist.option1: served by two electric power feeder circuits
quizlist.option2: served by three electric power feeder circuits
quizlist.option3: served by one electric power feeder circuits

quizlist.question: Lifeboats for ocean-going vessels shall carry in excess of the required regulation by________.?
When oily ballast has been pumped overboard, an entry must be made in the __________.?
What is the minimum number of fire pumps required on a cargo vessel of 2,000 GT?
Coast Guard regulations (46 CFR) require the upper ends of sounding tubes, terminating at the weather deck, to be closed by a?
____ is contained in Annex II of MARPOL 73/78?
quizlist.option1: Regulations for the Control of Pollution by Noxious Liquid Substances
quizlist.option2: Regulations for the Prevention of Pollution by Oil
quizlist.option3: Regulations for the Prevention of Pollution by Harmful Substances in a Packaged Form

quizlist.question: One of the many objectives of the ________ is to ensure the early and efficient collection and exchange of security-related information.
quizlist.option3: Code of Safe Practice for the Handling of Cargo

quizlist.question: The responsibility for safety and security rests on everybody on board the vessel. General house-keeping rules should be followed. Which of the listed rules is the most important?
quizlist.option1: Keep your working area clean and tidy.
quizlist.option2: Always use gloves when using grinding machines.
quizlist.option3: Do not carry lighters or matches when working outdoors.

quizlist.question: According to SOLAS requirement for lifeboat fall, what action must be taken with the fall at interval of not more than 5 years?
MARINA was created and geared towards the following objectives except__________.?
quizlist.option1: To create sub-agencies for the safe transport of goods and passengers
quizlist.option3: To increase production and productivity in the various islands and regions of the archipelago through the provision of linkage

quizlist.question: What is contained in Annex II of MARPOL 73/78?
quizlist.option1: Regulations for the Control of Pollution by Noxious Liquid Substances
quizlist.option2: Regulations for the Prevention of Pollution by Oil
quizlist.option3: Regulations for the Prevention of Pollution by Harmful Substances in a Packaged Form

quizlist.question: The responsibility for safety and security rests on everybody on board the vessel. General house-keeping rules should be followed. Which of the listed rules is the most important?
quizlist.option1: Keep your working area clean and tidy.
quizlist.option2: Always use gloves when using grinding machines.
quizlist.option3: Do not carry lighters or matches when working outdoors.

quizlist.question: What is the minimum number of fire pumps required on a cargo vessel of 2,000 GT?
The SOLAS 74 Chapter IX requires a mandatory compliance for Tankers, Bulk Carriers and Passenger vessels until July 1998. What is this law?
Keeping the draft at or below the load line mark will ensure that the vessel has adequate______.?
Under the New Regulations, what does SOLAS Chapter XI-1 deals with?
quizlist.option1: Special measures to enhance Maritime Safety
quizlist.option2: Security planning and Ship and Port Facility
quizlist.option3: Special provisions for Ship Security and Port Facilities

quizlist.question: What is the minimum number of fire pumps required on a cargo vessel of 900 GT?
As per SOLAS Regulation, the minimum Fuel supply for fast Rescue Boat shall last for______.?
What type of construction material should be avoided regarding fire protection purposes? (SOLAS II-2/2.2.3)?
What IMO conventions take care of the human safety at sea?
A class fire divisions are those divisions formed by bulkheads and decks. Which of the following requirements do not comply with the rules? SOLAS II- 2/3.3?
quizlist.option1: Insulated on both sides with approved non-combustible material
quizlist.option2: Preventing passage of smoke and flame to the end of a one hour standard test
quizlist.option3: Constructed of steel or other equivalent material

quizlist.question: The ISPS Code was Adopted by Contracting Government with Part A & B. The mandatory requirements & guidance is under the provisions of _______ of the SOLAS as amended.?
What is the primary purpose of a load line?
What form of oil discharge in large quantities that affects birds at sea and may strand on beaches if these do not disperse into the water?
Who is given the authority to carry out assessment for a certification as required by Chapter XI-2 of SOLAS as amended of the ISPS Code?
What law governs the basic principle of vessel nationality?
quizlist.option1: 1986 UN Convention of the high Seas

quizlist.question: Annex V of MARPOL 73/78 contains requirements pertaining to the discharge into the marine environment of____________.?
Any completed pages of the Oil Record Book must counter sign by the_________.?

According to Coast Guard Regulations (46 CFR), a power driven auxiliary steering gear for a vessel capable of a 12 knot service speed, must be able to meet the rudder movement requirements at which of the minimum vessel speeds listed below?
The Oil Record Book on a vessel NOT engaged on a foreign voyage shall be maintained on board for not less than __________.?
The ISPS Code was Adopted by Contracting Government with Part A & B. The mandatory requirements & guidance is under the provisions of _______ of the SOLAS as amended.?
Under SOLAS passenger ships and ships other than passenger ships of ______ and upwards constructed on or after 2002 must carry Voyage Data Recorders (VDR) to assist in accident investigation.?
The ISM Code requires ship owners or shipping companies to assign onboard their ship a ______ .?
Part C, Chapter VI of SOLAS deals with___________.?
The Oil Record Book on a vessel NOT engaged on a foreign voyage shall be maintained on board for not less than __________.?
Part C, Chapter VI of SOLAS deals with:?

Three methods of fire protection regarding internal divisional bulkheading may be adopted in accommodation and service spaces in cargo ships. Which of the given methods do not correspond to present rules? (SOLAS II-2/42.5)?
quizlist.option1: Construction of all internal bulkheads of class A divisions
quizlist.option2: Construction of all internal bulkheads of non-combustible class B or C divisions
quizlist.option3: Fitting of an automatic sprinkler, fire-detection and alarm system for the detection and extinction of fire in all spaces in which fire might be expected to

quizlist.question: Sludge are to be disposed off at sea?
Compliance with the terms of the load line certificate on a vessel is the job of whose officer?
What is the minimum number of immersion suits that are required to be provided for each open lifeboat under SOLAS rules?

At what security level is further specific protective security measures to be maintained for a limited period of time when a security incident is probable or imminent, although it may not be possible to identify the specific target?
What is the minimum number of fire pumps required on a cargo vessel of 900 GT?
What is defined as the inspection of the vessel authorized by the Philippine Coast Guard to verify the compliance to the National Regulations and International Standards?
When you join a new ship, how are you informed about safety rules, alarm instructions and your own duties in case of an emergency?
quizlist.option1: By muster lists exhibited in conspicuous places
quizlist.option2: By oral instructions by the Captain
quizlist.option3: By folder distributed to each crewmember
